Sponsors

The ACM-W chapter at RPI is proud to be supported by:

  • AQR
  • Google
  • RedHat
  • The NCWIT Student Seed Fund gift sponsored by Symantec
  • Professor Petros Drineas
  • Professor Stacy Patterson

We are always looking for more ways to support the women in our community. If you are interested in working with us please contact Sarabeth Jaffe at jaffes2[at]rpi.edu.
